question.title: itext 5.5 add mp4 video
question.body:
Is it possible to add mp4 videos to itet 5.5 and let them play upon showing?

What I tried:

final PdfPCell cell = new PdfPCell();
final Chunk chunk = new Chunk();
chunk.setAnnotation(PdfAnnotation
        .createScreen(
                writer, cell, "", PdfFileSpecification.fileEmbedded(writer, null, "",
                                        IOUtils.toByteArray(ExtractService.getTempDir(id).resolve(mediaId)
                                .toUri().toURL())),
                "video/mp4", true));
cell.setMinimumHeight(200f);
cell.addElement(chunk);

pom dependency:

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.itextpdf</groupId>
  <artifactId>itextpdf</artifactId>
  <version>5.5.13.4</version>
</dependency>

Pictures work perfectly, with videos I struggle. Maybe someone can drop a little hint...? Thx.
